user_data.target_needs: I was primarily seeking comfort and proper fit in a bra, with a focus on ease of use and support.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a bra that offered convenience and comfort, particularly one that was easy to put on and take off. The description highlighted the front-close feature, which I thought would be beneficial for daily wear. However, upon receiving it, I found that the sizing was not accurate, leading to disappointment.

I wanted a bra that provided comfortable support and a smooth silhouette, as described in the product details. The TruSupport design seemed appealing for my needs. Unfortunately, the sizing was completely off, which made the product unusable for me.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer true-to-size fitting, comfort, and quality materials. I value items that provide a good balance of support and softness, especially in clothing and footwear. Features like cushioned support, breathable fabrics, and a flattering fit are important to me. I also appreciate products that are versatile and can be used for various occasions, whether for casual wear or work. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that do not match their size descriptions, as this leads to discomfort and dissatisfaction. Poor quality, lack of durability, and difficulty in use are significant turn-offs for me.

conversation.content: I want comfort, proper fit, ease of use, and support in a bra. within my expected price range: [27.5, 36.0]
What type of closure do you prefer in a bra - front closure or back closure?
I prefer a front closure in a bra for ease of use.
What fabric material do you prefer in a bra for comfort and support?
I prefer bras made of soft and breathable fabric for comfort and support.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Just My Size Women's Easy On Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1107> / Item ID: B08V8YTH95 / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Love the convenience of front-close bras? Here's one that combines front-hook ease with comfortable full support. All at an affordable price in sizes up to 54 DD!"] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS® presents their Pure Comfort® wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Light Support Pullover Wireless T-Shirt Bra (Retired Colors)> / Item ID: B0BPPP8Z5L / Price: $21.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Pull it on or step right in. Either way, this Just My Size bra feels blissfully soft and comfy.']
